page.title: 07FOXTON LOCKS.
page.content: {Foxton Locks}consists of ten seperate locks in a staircase formation.These take the boats from the Market Harborough level up 75 feet(20 metres)to the 20 mile summit level. {Foxton Incline Plane Trust }is a charity which with the aid of donations and volunteer labour is currently trying to restore the old inclined plane.This was a way of avoiding the 2hour delay of going through the manually operated locks and consisted of 2 lifts.Boats entered a submerged box and were then mechanically dragged water and all in the box from the bottom to the top of the canal lock system.
